trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Ez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>a memóriában marad, amíg a társított <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>megsemmisül.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and to calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ugyanazon a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>További hívások ezt a módszert, és <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A> hívásokat küld vissza</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: A társ típusát határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>virtuális visszahívás.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is created and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>nem valósítja meg a visszahívást nem <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>jön létre, és ez a módszer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> has not been created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>, vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> még nem hozta létre a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the element associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a társított elem gyorsító kulcsa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
An <xref:System.String> string.
Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a hozzáférési kulcsot a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
The access key for this <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlőtípusra a következő lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a karakterláncot, amely egyedileg azonosítja a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.

The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Az automation-azonosító értéke a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>tulajdonság, és ha, amely nincs beállítva, az a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the automation identifier.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> representing the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> a határoló téglalapon képviselő a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
The bounding rectangle.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény elemeinek gyermek lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a nevét a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
An <xref:System.String> string.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> a kattintható területet, amely a jelöli, amelyek a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.

For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the clickable point is any point that is within the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that would result in issuing the command that the button represents, when the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha az elem egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a kattintható pontja az egyetlen pont, belül látható ügyfélterületének színét, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, mivel ennek eredményeképpen a parancsot a jelölő a gomb, amikor a felhasználó kattint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>az egérrel.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: A pont, amely a kattintható terület méretét, az elem jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely funkcióinak lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
The string that is returned generally is the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott általában karakterlánca ugyanannak a szövegnek a tooltip vezérlő foglalt.

trans-unit.source: The string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterláncot, amely funkcióit mutatja be a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Karakterlánc, amely a visual állapotának közvetíti lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
For example, the status of a messenger contact could be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Például olyan messengerbe kapcsolattartó állapotát "Foglalt" vagy "Online" lehet.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the status.

Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of the item that the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az emberek számára olvasható karakterlánc, amely tartalmazza az elem típusa, amely a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
Examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
The string that contains the item type.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely tartalmazza az elem típusa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> céloz, amely a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.

For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method could get the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha az elem egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>vezérlő, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>módszer sikerült a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>társított a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> elem által megcélzott a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A felirat a lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A name tulajdonság-re, amelyet a felhasználó használja azt ismertetik, mely a vezérlő éppen hivatkozik, amely karakterláncként kell beállítani.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Fontos, hogy az összes vezérlőjének képviselő szöveges alakot a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , hogy a programozott módon hivatkozhat a vezérlő honosított módon.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> adott irányba elrendezését.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő mintát lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
An object that implements the interface if patternInterface is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Egy objektum, amely megvalósítja a felhasználói felületén, patternInterface van ; ellenkező esetben .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> jelenleg rendelkezik billentyűzet beviteli fókuszba.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az elem bemeneti billentyűzetfókusz; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> egy eleme, amely a felhasználó számára látható adatokat tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is something that the end user would understand as being interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> , amelyet a végfelhasználók volna megértéséhez, interaktív illetve hozzájárul a vezérlő logikai struktúráját a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this automation peer can receive and send events to the associated element.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy az automatizálási társ kaphat, és elküldje az eseményeket a társított elem beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az automatizálási társ kap, és elküldje az eseményeket; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> billentyűzetfókusz fogad el.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> ki a képernyő van.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság nem adja meg, hogy az elem látható.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: Bizonyos körülmények között egy elem a képernyőn kell, de még nem láthatják, például ha az elem által egyéb elemek van látható.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ebben az esetben a metódus alakítanák vissza `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az elem nem a képernyőn; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> védett tartalom szerepel.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is required to be filled out on a form.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> szükséges az űrlap ki kell tölteni.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti billentyűzetfókusz állítja be a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
